description: A striking medium-sized parrot, primarily green with a bright red patch on its forehead (lore), yellow cheeks, and blue streaks behind the eyes.
temperament: Very intelligent, curious, and energetic. They can form strong bonds and be very affectionate, but also require a lot of mental stimulation to prevent boredom.
loudness: Loud. They have a strong, loud call and will use it.
vocalization: Very good talking ability with a clear voice. Many can learn a wide range of words and phrases.
dietaryNeeds: A varied diet of pellets, leafy greens, and other vegetables is key. Limit fruits and high-fat seeds.
healthPointers: Can live for 50+ years. Susceptible to common avian diseases like PDD, psittacosis, and fatty liver disease.
housing: Needs a large cage with plenty of toys. Minimum 36"W x 24"D x 48"H. Noise level is too high for most apartments.
